column2: Forced Marriage
Indoctrinate Prisoners
A guard came and lead me to my captor's throne room, where he said that he is considering marrying me.
It's better than rotting in the dungeon... barely.
I'd rather marry a toad!
One of the prisoners you are considering marrying has been brought before you. [From.GetSheHeCap] says that [From.GetSheHe] will begrudgingly accept marrying you.
I am glad you saw reason.
This is not the one I meant. Take [From.GetHerHim] back.
My captor has returned me to my cell.
Perhaps I was too hasty?
My captor put me through some sham of a wedding ceremony, and forced me to consumate it.
Oh, how I wish I were home!
A guard came and lead me to my captor's throne room, where [From.GetSheHe] said that [From.GetSheHe] is considering taking me as [From.GetHerHis] ward.
Do I have a choice?
One of the imprisoned children that you are considering making your ward has been brought before you. You question [From.GetHerHim] thoroughly.
Yes, this one will do.
No, I shall not waste time on this one.
Your captor has decided to personally tutor you. You have been moved to a tower room and are still under guard, but it's better than that dingy cell.
I wish I could go home.
You have been judged and found not worthy of being your captor's ward. You are lead back to your dungeon cell.
I miss home.
Forced into marriage
